details.title: 1. Mathematical Foundations
details.content: Focus on problem-solving with real-world scenarios and common interview questions related to statistics, probability, and linear algebra. Outcome: Ability to solve complex mathematical problems and explain your reasoning, a common interview requirement.

details.title: 2. Basic Data Analysis & Case Studies
details.content: Incorporate case studies and typical data analysis interview questions from top companies. Outcome: Proficiency in explaining and executing data analysis tasks, critical for technical interviews.

details.title: 3. Introduction to Databases & SQL Challenges
details.content: Intensive practice with SQL through common interview questions and scenarios. Outcome: Ability to solve complex SQL queries and database design questions, often asked in interviews.

title: Stage 2: Intermediate Skills, Specializations & Coding Interviews

details.title: 4. Advanced Data Analysis & Interview Simulations
details.content: Enhancements: Focus on scenarios and questions commonly presented in interviews, including machine learning model evaluation and data interpretation. Outcomes: Confidence in tackling advanced data analysis questions, a staple in many technical interviews.

details.title: 5. Bayesian Inference & Case-Based Learning
details.content: Enhancements: Emphasis on real-world applications and typical interview questions regarding Bayesian methods. Outcomes: Ability to articulate and apply Bayesian methods in various scenarios, a valuable skill in interviews.

details.title: 6. Comparative & Hypothesis Testing in Business Contexts
details.content: Enhancements: Focus on designing and interpreting tests with real business cases and common interview questions. Outcomes: Mastery in explaining and conducting comparative tests, a skill often explored in interviews.

title: Stage 3: Advanced Techniques, Emerging Technologies & System Design

details.title: 7. Big Data Technologies & Scenario-Based Learning
details.content: Enhancements: Hands-on experience with big data scenarios and interview-style questions on big data tools and architectures. Outcomes: Demonstrated understanding of big data technologies, crucial for roles in leading companies.

details.title: 8. NLP & AI in Practice
details.content: Enhancements: Integration of practical NLP/AI applications and common interview questions in these domains. Outcomes: Ability to discuss and implement NLP and AI solutions, showcasing your knowledge depth.

details.title: 9. Deep Learning & Neural Networks with Practical Challenges
details.content: Enhancements: Focus on deep learning concepts and architectures through the lens of common interview challenges. Outcomes: Proficiency in explaining and utilizing deep learning techniques, a sought-after skill.

details.title: 10. Reinforcement Learning & Strategic Thinking
details.content: Enhancements: Emphasis on applying reinforcement learning to strategic problems, similar to those in interviews. Outcomes: Capability to devise and articulate solutions using reinforcement learning, demonstrating strategic thinking.

details.title: 11. Advanced AI Topics & Ethical Considerations
details.content: Enhancements: Discussion on cutting-edge AI, including ethical implications, often a topic in interviews for senior positions. Outcomes: Ability to engage in thoughtful discussions on advanced AI topics, showing your forward-thinking approach.

details.title: 12. System Design & Architecture
details.content: Enhancements: Understanding of system design principles through common interview questions and scenarios. Outcomes: Ability to design and critique systems and architectures, a key aspect of technology leadership roles.

details.title: 13. Capstone Project with Interview Focus
details.content: Enhancements: The project will be geared towards solving a complex problem commonly presented in big company interviews. Outcomes: A showcase of your ability to tackle real-world problems from start to finish, as expected in interviews.
